item.title: "My Father Was a Mulatto, My Grandfather Was a Negro, and My Great-grandfather a Monkey. You See, Sir, My Family Starts Where Yours Ends."
item.description: “My Father Was a Mulatto, My Grandfather Was a Negro, and My Great-grandfather a Monkey. You See, Sir, My Family Starts Where Yours Ends.

item.title: Two Monkeys Paid Unfairly with Grapes
item.description: Two Monkeys Paid Unfairly with Grapes One monkey was paid with a cucumber, and one a far tastier grape. When the first saw the second get rewarded more for the same task, it threw a fit.
